text:
Mystery Applicant | Full Stack Ruby / Rails Developer | ONSITE | Bath or Bristol, England

We are looking for talented and friendly Ruby devs to join us in building a surveying and business intelligence tool onsite (part-remote OK) in Bath, England.

Note that if you're not a Ruby developer but you're interested in picking it up then we would also like to speak to you.

For more details please see:

https://mysteryapplicant.workable.com/jobs/489994
